name: Zombie Road Trip (itch)
description:
Zombie Road Trip is a driving/shooting game where you must avoid being killed by zombies.

WASD to move car. Mouse and left-click to shoot. Escape to exit (Windows .exe version only).

Created for Weekly Game Jam 12.

Credits

  • Game made using GameMaker: Studio
  • Graphics made using Aseprite and GIMP

Audio:

  • Gunshot by Ben Jaszczak (https://opengameart.org/content/the-free-firearm-sound-library)
  • Zombie death by Ogrebane (https://opengameart.org/content/monster-sound-pack-volume-1)
  • Car crash by squareal (https://freesound.org/people/squareal/sounds/237375/)
  • Dark Mystery (background music) by Jason Shaw (http://audionautix.com)
